name: Snake Den
description:
The challenge is too big for you alone, so remember to use your friends as allies. Just don't let their tails get in your way!

Features

  • 5 Worlds and 100 Levels
  • Unlock Unique Bonus Levels
  • High Scores, Compete with Friends and Family
  • Ghosts, Just remember you can never truly die, but you can get revenge!
